TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ParentControlDesigner extends System.Windows.Forms.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 扩展支持嵌套控件的 的设计模式行为。

span.span: Extends the design mode behavior of a that supports nested controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以包含子控件的控件的设计器提供基类。 provides a base class for designers of controls that can contain child controls. 除了的方法和功能从继承和类，使子控件以添加到中，从中删除，则选定内，并且控件在设计它所扩展的行为在排列时间。In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the and classes, enables child controls to be added to, removed from, selected within, and arranged within the control whose behavior it extends at design time. 你可以将一个设计器关联类型使用。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 有关自定义设计时行为的概述，请参阅[扩展设计时支持](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2)。For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ac8a6a-42fd-4bc8-bf33-b212811297e2). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何实现一个自定义。The following example demonstrates how to implement a custom . 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供接口。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-cpp[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/CPP/samplecontrol.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/CS/samplecontrol.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IToolboxUserExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IToolboxUserExample/VB/samplecontrol.vb#1)]

summary.span: 从指定工具创建一个组件或控件并将其添加到当前的设计文档。

span.span: Creates a component or control from the specified tool and adds it to the current design document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的组件或控件定位在当前所选控件的中心。The new component or control is positioned at the center of the currently selected control. 此方法使用的默认大小的工具，如果该工具有指定的默认大小。This method uses the default size for the tool, if the tool has a default size specified. 若要指定的位置或位置和的组件或控件的大小，请使用其他重载之一方法。To specify a location or location and size for the component or control, use one of the other overloaded methods.

param.name: location
param.span: 设计时视图屏幕坐标中的 ，此位置将作为组件的中心。

span.span: The , in design-time view screen coordinates, at which to center the component.

summary.span: 从指定工具创建组件或控件，并将其添至当前设计文档中的指定位置。

span.span: Creates a component or control from the specified tool and adds it to the current design document at the specified location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的组件或控件位于指定的位置附近`location`参数。The new component or control is positioned around the location specified by the `location` parameter. 如果组件的默认大小，此方法对于工具的组件，使用默认大小。This method uses the default size for the tool's component, if the component has a default size. 若要指定的位置和大小的组件或控件，使用适当的重载方法。To specify a location and size for the component or control, use the appropriate overloaded method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的组件或控件位于其左上角指定位置处使用和值`bounds`参数。The new component or control is positioned with its upper left corner at the location specified by the and values of the `bounds` parameter. 新的组件或控件的大小将设置为指定的值和属性`bounds`参数。The size of the new component or control will be set to the values specified by the and properties of the `bounds` parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认位置通常是 (0，0)。The default location is usually (0,0). 如果容器具有特殊边框，或者出于其他原因，通常会更改默认位置。The default location is typically changed if the container has special borders, or for other reasons.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检查可以改为处理该操作的拖放处理任何父控件。This method checks any parent control for a drag-and-drop handler that can handle the operation instead. 如果存在，此方法将传递方法并返回到。If one exists, this method passes the to the method and returns. 如果没有父拖放处理存在，此方法会尝试创建一个工具，如果工具箱项放到设计器控件。If no parent drag-and-drop handler exists, this method attempts to create a tool if a toolbox item has been dropped on the designer control.

summary.span: 调用以响应在组件上时按下鼠标左键并按住不放这一操作。

span.span: Called in response to the left mouse button being pressed and held while over the component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在组件上按下鼠标左键的响应中调用此方法。This method is called in response to the left mouse button being pressed on a component. 设计器将重写该方法以提供用于在控件内的组件的"套索"所选内容机制的基窗体。The designer overrides the base form of this method to provide a "lasso" selection mechanism for components within the control. > [!NOTE] > 可以将一个点传递到屏幕坐标中方法类来获取相对于窗口左上角的控件的点的坐标。You can pass a point in screen coordinates to the method of the class to obtain the coordinates of the point relative to the upper-left corner of the control.

param.name: cancel
param.span: 要取消拖动操作，为 ；要提交操作，则为 。

span.span: to cancel the drag operation; to commit it.

summary.span: 在拖放操作结束时调用，以完成或取消此次操作。

span.span: Called at the end of a drag-and-drop operation to complete or cancel the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在拖动操作的末尾调用此方法。This method is called at the end of a drag operation. 此方法将提交到，则取消拖动操作。This method either commits to or cancels the drag operation.

summary.span: 提供更改当前鼠标光标的机会。

span.span: Provides an opportunity to change the current mouse cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法设置根据下列规则的鼠标光标： 如果工具箱服务已选定工具，它允许以将光标放置工具箱服务。This method sets the mouse cursor according to the following rules: If the toolbox service has a tool selected, it allows the toolbox service to set the cursor. 否则，将鼠标光标设置为默认的鼠标光标。Otherwise, the mouse cursor is set to the default mouse cursor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这接口方法重写将一组属性添加到此设计器的控件，允许用户设置相关的网格显示和子控件的对齐方式的选项。This interface method override adds a set of properties to this designer's control that allow a user to set options related to the grid display and child control alignment. 此方法将添加以下可浏览属性： `DrawGrid`， `SnapToGrid`，和`GridSize`。This method adds the following browsable properties: `DrawGrid`, `SnapToGrid`, and `GridSize`.
